"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5484ce9b63687229685e0000#post_5484ce9b63687229685e0000
The one in front is Rider #1, He has an IQ of 600, And A lot of different variations of the rider kick.

The ones in the back are Skyrider. (Pretty much the same as the first rider except not Quite as smart, Capable of flying, And Physically Stronger) and Black. (Simple fighting style, But a very effective one)

I will concede. (Espeon boobs are the only ones that really suck.)
